name: Macrozoobenthos data collected in the East Constanta sector of the Romanian marine waters between 1977 and 1999
description: The macrozoobentos dataset includes a number of 234 samplescollected in the East Constanta sector of the Romanian marinewaters from five standardstations (Station 1-5) between 14 m to 55m depths. Van Veen grab with a sampling area of 1/20 m2 was employed as a macrozoobenthossampler. One replicate was collected at every station. Sampling was done in winter,spring,summer and autumn mounths.The sampleshave been analyzed qualitative (number of species) and quantitative(densities and biomasses).The macroinvertebrates have been identified at specieslevel.
